content:
Dear Fraser Ian Sheal McAulay, 
We are sorry to inform you that as of 1st December 2023, you’ll no longer be employed with BingusCO. As discussed, we think this is the best decision, because of your repeated sexual and physical assault towards employees and acquaintances. This is the final step in our disciplinary process.

From 1st December and onwards, you won’t be eligible for any compensation or benefits associated with your position.

You are entitled to your salary up until the end of the month and we’ll also compensate you for your remaining vacation days. We’ll also provide severance pay that will amount to £2. We will give you extra information with the complete details of compensation or other related information you’re entitled to receive from us in the coming days.

Please keep in mind that you have signed a non-compete, non-solicitation and non-disclosure agreement. If you have any information about our customers, employees or other stakeholders stored on paper or on your personal devices, you must delete it immediately. 

If you have questions or clarifications, we are at your disposal for up to five working days after your last day of employment You can contact the HR department at hr@bingusco.xyz. 

We wish you the best of luck. 

Jake McKay and Kevin Rybicki

Founders of BingusCO



 signed:___________________________
name: Letter of Termination
SNOW
content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
<style>
body {
  height: 100vh;
  background: black;
  overflow: hidden;
}

.snow {
  color: white;
  border-radius: 5px;
  position: absolute;
  animation: fall linear 4s;
}

@keyframes fall {
  100% {
top: 200%;
  }
}
</style>
<script>
window.onload = function() {
  setInterval(snowFlake, 50)
}

function snowFlake() {
  const snow = document.createElement("div");
  snow.textContent = "❆";
  snow.className = "snow";
  snow.style.top = "-10%";
  snow.style.left = Math.random() * 100 + "%";
  var colour = Math.random();
  if (colour > 0.66) {
  snow.style.color = "#5a5c5a";
  } else if (colour < 0.33) {
  snow.style.color = "#7c807d";
  }
  snow.style.animation = "fall linear " + Math.random() * 10 + "s";
  document.body.appendChild(snow);
}
</script>
</head>
<body>
</body>
</html>

name: Bobbed Bernice Scalps Cousin and Flees!
content: Yesterday was a very scandalous day! A young unpopular girl was coerced into bobbing her hair by her cousin but she soon found out that her bobbed hair made everything worse! This soon led her to sever her cousin's two braids and run away! The girl, named Bernice

name: Radiation in Smoke Alarms
content:
Radiation is used in smoke alarms to detect the smoke.                     In the late 1930s, Walter Jaeger was trying to make a poison gas detector
Smoke alarms emit alpha radiation which ionises the air                     with a similar design to the modern day smoke alarm. His poison gas detector
around it and causes a current between two electrodes to                didn't work and instead detected smoke which led to the modern day smoke
flow. The smoke then stops the ionisation because alpha                  alarm. 
particles are weakly penetrating and so the current stops 
and the alarm will go off.
